short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Peter Pavlovic's personal site. Everything you need to know about the man with the plan...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I use this Chrome application as a handy way to access my site. My world is living in Chrome and I use ChromeOS devices almost exclusively so this makes it quite easy to get where I want to go.

I use my site to publish my contact information, interesting random links and my spam statistics. I also have a portal page for my personal use to access all of my Google services.
